```{r}
#| label: setup
#| echo: false

library(tidyverse)

gas_data <- readr::read_csv("weekly_gas_prices.csv")
```

## Weekly Gas Prices Analysis

The dataset contains weekly gas prices over several years. Below is a plot summarizing the trends in gas prices.

```{r}
#| label: gas_prices_plot
#| code-fold: true

gas_data |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = price, color = "blue")) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Weekly Gas Prices Over Time",
       x = "Week",
       y = "Price")
```
